channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 19:09 Driven the alarm to the Sumy region.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 19:09 Driven the alarm to the Sumy region.Creck on subsequent messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 18:17 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. item.title: 🟠 14:00 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. The 24 -hour free hotline on issues will be urgently evacuated from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 08003392911 VAABAULATION
